author: allee8285
msg: OPENJPA-991 - disable TestException.testThrowsOptimisticException() until this issue is addressed. This will avoid the test hang condition and allow other tests to proceed, when run in DB2.

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-384. csharp: Fix handling of fields named "value"

author: gnodet
msg: SMXCOMP-472: fix bad retrieval of the attachment name with geronimo javamail provider

author: bmbouter
msg: Removed all configuration which required the setting of variables inside the esx.pm file.  These items have now been moved to the database in the vmhost table.
Removed the requirement that all management nodes mount the storage library via NFS.  These connections have been refactored to use SSH.
Updated the instructions to reflect these changes
